Nudge venndir label

Source: R/venndir-render.R
nudge_venndir_label.Rd

Nudge venndir label

nudge_venndir_label(
  venndir_output,
  set = NULL,
  x_offset = 0,
  y_offset = 0,
  unit_type = c("absolute", "relative"),
  label_types = c("main", "signed"),
  show_label = TRUE,
  ...
)

See also

Other venndir utility: curate_venn_labels(), eulerr2polys(), expand_range(), find_vennpoly_overlaps(), get_venn_shapes(), make_color_contrast(), make_venn_combn_df(), make_venn_test(), match_list(), print_color_df(), rescale_ps(), rescale_p(), shrink_df(), sp_percent_area(), venndir_label_style()

Examples

setlist <- make_venn_test(100, 3, do_signed=TRUE)

vo <- venndir(setlist,
   overlap_type="each",
   return_items=TRUE,
   label_style="lite_box",
   main="Default venndir")


vo <- nudge_venndir_label(vo,
   set=c("set_A&set_B&set_C"),
   x_offset=3,
   y_offset=-1)
render_venndir(vo,
   main="After nudging one count label")
